18 import rospy
19 from threading import Thread, Lock
20 
21 # Command Status
22 from std_msgs.msg import Int8
23 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus, HardwareStatus
24 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import SetInt
25 from niryo_robot_rpi.srv import LedBlinker
26 
27 from niryo_robot_system_api_client import system_api_client
28 
29 from ..common.rpi_ros_utils import LedState
30 from .rpi_io_objects import Led
31 
32 LED_OFF = 0
33 LED_BLUE = 1
34 LED_GREEN = 2
35 LED_BLUE_GREEN = 3
36 LED_RED = 4
37 LED_PURPLE = 5
38 LED_RED_GREEN = 6
39 LED_WHITE = 7
40 
41 
42 class LEDManager(object):
43 
44  def __init__(self, lock=None):
45  self._red_led = None
46  self._green_led = None
47  self._blue_led = None
48 
49  rospy.sleep(0.1)
50  self.state = LedState.OK
51  self._led_state_topic = rospy.Publisher('/niryo_robot/rpi/led_state', Int8, latch=True, queue_size=10)
52 
53  self._blinker_thread = None
54  self._activate_blinker = None
55  self._blinker_frequency = None
56  self._blinker_color = None
57  self._blinker_stop_time = None
58 
59  self._set_led_state_server = rospy.Service('/niryo_robot/rpi/set_led_state',
60  SetInt,
61  self._callback_set_led_state)
62 
63  self._set_led_custom_blinker_server = rospy.Service('/niryo_robot_rpi/set_led_custom_blinker',
64  LedBlinker,
65  self._callback_set_led_custom_blinker)
66 
67  self.hardware_status_subscriber = rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/hardware_status',
68  HardwareStatus,
69  self._callback_hardware_status)
70 
71  self.wifi_status_timer = rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(1), self.__callback_wifi_state)
72 
73  self.set_led_from_state(dxl_leds=True)
74 
75  if lock is None:
76  lock = Lock()
77 
78  self._red_led = Led(lock, rospy.get_param("~led/r_pin"), "Led Red")
79  self._green_led = Led(lock, rospy.get_param("~led/g_pin"), "Led Green")
80  self._blue_led = Led(lock, rospy.get_param("~led/b_pin"), "Led Blue")
81 
82  self.set_led_from_state(dxl_leds=True)
83  rospy.loginfo('LED manager has been started.')
84 
85  @staticmethod
86  def set_dxl_leds(color):
87  leds = 0
88  if color == LED_RED:
89  leds = 1
90  elif color == LED_GREEN:
91  leds = 2
92  elif color == LED_BLUE:
93  leds = 4
94  # 4 is yellow, no yellow
95  elif color == LED_BLUE_GREEN:
96  leds = 6
97  elif color == LED_PURPLE:
98  leds = 5
99  elif color == LED_WHITE:
100  leds = 7
101  elif color == LED_RED_GREEN:
102  leds = 8
103 
104  try:
105  rospy.wait_for_service('niryo_robot/ttl_driver/set_dxl_leds', timeout=1)
106  except rospy.ROSException:
107  rospy.logwarn("Niryo ROS control LED service is not up!")
108  try:
109  set_dxl_leds = rospy.ServiceProxy('niryo_robot/ttl_driver/set_dxl_leds', SetInt)
110  set_dxl_leds(leds)
111  except rospy.ServiceException:
112  rospy.logwarn("Could not call niryo_robot/ttl_driver/set_dxl_leds service")
113 
114  def set_led(self, color, dxl_leds=False):
115  if self._red_led is not None:
116  self._red_led.value = color & 0b100
117  if self._green_led is not None:
118  self._green_led.value = color & 0b010
119  if self._blue_led is not None:
120  self._blue_led.value = color & 0b001
121 
122  if dxl_leds:
123  self.set_dxl_leds(color)
124 
125  def set_led_from_state(self, dxl_leds=False):
126  if self.state == LedState.SHUTDOWN:
127  self.set_led(LED_PURPLE, dxl_leds)
128  elif self.state == LedState.HOTSPOT:
129  self.set_led(LED_BLUE, dxl_leds)
130  elif self.state == LedState.WAIT_HOTSPOT:
131  self.set_led(LED_BLUE, dxl_leds)
132  elif self.state == LedState.OK:
133  self.set_led(LED_GREEN, dxl_leds)
134  elif self.state == LedState.PAUSE:
135  self.set_led(LED_RED_GREEN, dxl_leds)
136  else:
137  self.set_led(LED_OFF, dxl_leds)
138 
139  self._led_state_topic.publish(self.state)
140 
141  def __callback_wifi_state(self):
142  if self.state == LedState.SHUTDOWN:
143  return
144 
145  response = system_api_client.wifi_state()
146  if not response.success:
147  return
148 
149  if response.data['hotspot_state'] is True:
150  if self.state != LedState.HOTSPOT:
151  self.state = LedState.HOTSPOT
152  self.set_led_from_state(dxl_leds=True)
153  elif self.state == LedState.HOTSPOT:
154  self.state = LedState.OK
155  self.set_led_from_state(dxl_leds=True)
156 
157  def _callback_hardware_status(self, msg):
158  # filter error 1 = input voltage
159  if not msg.connection_up or list(msg.hardware_errors) > len(msg.hardware_errors) * [1]:
160  self.set_led(LED_RED, dxl_leds=True) # blink red
161  rospy.sleep(0.05)
162  self.set_led_from_state(dxl_leds=True)
163 
164  def _callback_set_led_state(self, req):
165  state = req.value
166  if state == LedState.SHUTDOWN:
167  self.state = LedState.SHUTDOWN
168  self.set_led_from_state(dxl_leds=True)
169  elif state == LedState.WAIT_HOTSPOT:
170  self.state = LedState.WAIT_HOTSPOT
171  self.set_led_from_state(dxl_leds=True)
172  elif state == LedState.PAUSE:
173  self.state = LedState.PAUSE
174  self.set_led_from_state(dxl_leds=False)
175  elif state == LedState.OK:
176  self.state = LedState.OK
177  self.set_led_from_state(dxl_leds=False)
178  else:
179  return {'status': CommandStatus.LED_MANAGER_ERROR, 'message': 'Not yet implemented'}
180  return {'status': CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'message': 'Set LED OK'}
181 
182  def _callback_set_led_custom_blinker(self, req):
183  self._activate_blinker = req.activate
184  if self._activate_blinker:
185  self._blinker_frequency = rospy.Rate(max(min(100, req.frequency), 1))
186  self._blinker_color = req.color
187  if req.blinker_duration > 0:
188  self._blinker_stop_time = rospy.Time.now() + rospy.Duration.from_sec(req.blinker_duration)
189  else:
190  self._blinker_stop_time = None
191  if not self._blinker_thread or not self._blinker_thread.is_alive():
192  self._blinker_thread = Thread(target=self.blinker, name="led_blinker_thread")
193  self._blinker_thread.start()
194 
195  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success"
196 
197  def blinker(self):
198  while not rospy.is_shutdown() and self._activate_blinker:
199  self.set_led(self._blinker_color)
200  self._blinker_frequency.sleep()
201  self.set_led_from_state()
202  self._blinker_frequency.sleep()
203 
204  if self._blinker_stop_time and rospy.Time.now() >= self._blinker_stop_time:
205  return
